📱 Manual Setup Instructions

iPhone/iPad (Calendar App)

  1. Open the Calendar app
  2. Tap the + button to create a new event
  3. Set the Title:
  4. Set the Time:
  5. Set Repeat: Every Day
  6. Set Alert:
  7. Tap Add to save

Android (Google Calendar)

  1. Open Google Calendar
  2. Tap the + button
  3. Set the Event title:
  4. Set the Date & time:
  5. Set Repeat: Daily
  6. Set Notifications:
  7. Tap Save

Mac (Calendar App)

  1. Open the Calendar app
  2. Double-click on the date
  3. Set the Title:
  4. Set the Time:
  5. Set Repeat: Every Day
  6. Set Alert:
  7. Press Enter to save

💡 Pro Tips:

  • Set multiple reminders: 15 minutes before, 5 minutes before, and at the time
  • Use a consistent time: Pick a time when you're usually free
  • Make it visible: Use emojis in the title to make it stand out
  • Test it: Set a test reminder for 2 minutes from now to make sure it works
